edu.usm.sosw.sword.db

Interface YouthDAO


  • public interface YouthDAO
    This interface exists to provide proper access to the youths table. SQL is written in the SqlUpdate and SqlQuery annotations above every function and then rewritten and executed by JDBI. The YouthDAO interface is used by the YouthResources class in the resources package. RegisterMapper annotation allows JDBI to bind the YouthMapper class to this interface. Without the RegisterMapper annotation, the SQL query results would not bind properly to the Youth Object.
    Version:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Sean T. Purvis
    See Also:
    Youth, YouthMapper, YouthResource
